text: "No longer, I want to speak to you," took her out of the room, and the other, that I had known it, and purposely kept it from him.

passages.full_quote: <used>No longer, I want to</used> begin my thoughts and my life with Atman and with the suffering of the world

passages.fragment: , I want to speak to you , '' took her out of the room
passages.full_quote: "Come here, my love, <used>I want to speak to you," took her out of the room</used>

passages.fragment: out of the room , and the other
passages.full_quote: Baroness, some coffee for him <used>out of the room, and the other</used> to justifying the deceit

passages.fragment: , and the other , that I had
passages.full_quote: The first mentioned was, that, regardless of the sentiments of either, I had detached Mr. Bingley from your sister, <used>and the other, that I had</used>, in defiance of various claims, in defiance of honour and humanity, ruined the immediate prosperity and blasted the prospects of Mr. Wickham

passages.fragment: , that I had known it , and purposely kept it from him
passages.full_quote: I could not allow myself to conceal that your sister had been in town three months last winter, <used>that I had known it, and purposely kept it from him</used>
